text.author: Kharma Medic
text.title: LONDON ROOM TOUR VLOG | KharmaMedic
text.summary: In a room tour video, Kharma Medic shows viewers his London apartment, including the bed and couch area, his coffee table, the balcony, his filming gear and his radio alarm clock.
text.summary2: Two years after moving in, Kharma Medic proudly gives viewers a tour of his room in London due to popular request, and he shows viewers various things, like the bed and couch area, the small balcony, the color-matched pictures on the wall, his storage spaces and clothing, the floor-to-ceiling windows, and the posters that he bought back in 2013 as a university student.
